channel.title: 2021 December on Plazi
channel.description: Recent content in 2021 December on Plazi

item.title: New Species of 2021
item.description: Numerous scientific journals have published taxonomic treatments of a great variety of newly discovered species in 2021. Here we present a small selection of 12 spectacular species with links to their complete taxonomic treatment. Since we can only protect what we know, we want people to have free access to taxonomic data, always and everywhere. Solmaris flavofinis Solmaris flavolinis (click for full size image) During 75 night-time dives in the Gulfstream off Florida, 46 species were identified and six newly discovered species were described.
